channel.title: Namespaces on Introduction to Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in Namespaces on Introduction to Kubernetes

item.title: Exercises
item.description: Kubernetes yaml files createNamespace.yaml (0 ko) Update createNamespace.yaml with your namespace Create your namespace kubectl create -f ./createNamespace.yaml Verify your namespace exists $ kubectl get namespaces NAME STATUS AGE default Active 1d kube-system Active 1d kube-public Active 1d YOUR_NAME_SPACE Active 1d Set your namespace to the default kubectl config set-context $(kubectl config current-context) --namespace=<insert-namespace-name-here> Validate it kubectl config view | grep namespace:
